Token.Abstract: The methods in the TSQCalendarViewDelegate protocol allow the adopting delegate to either prevent a day from being selected or respond to it.
Asks the delegate whether a particular date is selectable.

Parameter.Name: calendarView
Parameter.Abstract: The calendar view that is selecting a date.

Parameter.Name: date
Parameter.Abstract: Midnight on the date being selected.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Whether or not the date is selectable.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that a particular date was selected.

Parameter.Name: calendarView
Parameter.Abstract: The calendar view that is selecting a date.

Parameter.Name: date
Parameter.Abstract: Midnight on the date being selected.
